comment.author: 22913287@N02
comment._content: Frank Starbuck was my uncle. He was a rancher the very end. He died in 2006. Here is a link to a newspaper article about him published shortly after his death. www.postindependent.com/article/20060826/VALLEYNEWS/10826...

comment._content: Frank was a great guy.  I watched the first Super Bowl with him.  We all miss him.
